io.sphere.internal.request

Class QueryRequestMapping<A,B>

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.sphere.internal.request.QueryRequestMapping<A,B>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    QueryRequest<B>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ProductQueryRequest

    public abstract class QueryRequestMapping<A,B>
extends java.lang.Object
implements QueryRequest<B>
    Converts a QueryRequest<A> in a QueryRequest<B>.

        Specified by:
        pageSize in interface QueryRequest<B>

      • expand

        public QueryRequest<B> expand(java.lang.String... paths)
        Description copied from interface: QueryRequest
        Requests Reference fields to be expanded in the returned objects. Expanded references contain full target objects they link to.

        As an illustration, here is how reference expansion looks at the underlying JSON transport level. Given a customer object: 

        {
  "name": "John Doe"
  "customerGroup": {
    "typeId": "customer-group",
    "id": "7ba61480-6a72-4a2a-a72e-cd39f75a7ef2"
  }
}
        This is what the result looks like when the path 'customerGroup' has been expanded: 
        {
  "name": "John Doe"
  "customerGroup": {
    typeId: "customer-group",
    id: "7ba61480-6a72-4a2a-a72e-cd39f75a7ef2"
    obj: {
      "name": "Gold"
    }
  }
}
        Specified by:
        expand in interface QueryRequest<B>
        Parameters:
        paths - The paths to be expanded, such as 'customerGroup'.
